verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is seated here,
Waiting for His bride to come in
Clothed in His righteousness,
Being made free from their sin,
So come into His chamber
And shut the door round about.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O Lord, I want to feel Your presence,
I want to know who You are
And, O Lord, I want to see Your fullness,
Reveal Who You are.
